nodes.text: Hunter was an Imperial Navy Nebulon-B frigate, it was active in the Galactic Civil War about two years before the Battle of Yavin. Sometime after the Battle of Yavin, along with the Nebulon B Frigate Avenger, it launched an attack on the Habassan freighter group Starlifter. Keyan Farlander and a number of B-Wings were successful in holding off the attack destroying both frigates.
